channel.title: folium on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in folium on Memo Tut

item.title: The result of making and sharing an Italian honeymoon map album in Python
item.description: I went on a honeymoon to Italy a while ago. I took about 1,000 photos when I noticed it on a tour of Milan, Venice, Florence, Pisa, Rome and Pompeii in one week. There was some free time, so I took a walk around 10,000 steps every day, so I wanted to make a record with the route included, so I made a map album…! Visualization The whole picture looks something like this.

item.title: [Visualization with folium] I feel that the number of family members has increased too much in recent years
item.description: This is the 21st day article of [MYJLab Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/myjlab).Thatchwillbeincharge.(Sorryforthedelay) This time what to do Recently, there is a phenomenon that there is a FamilyMart on the other side of the road across my road. In order to visualize this phenomenon, I would like to drop the increase in the number of FamilyMart stores in the time series heat map for each prefecture. What to use There is a library called Leaflet that can draw nice maps with JavaScript.
